name: Sandalations Adventure
description:
Sandalation was just a normal scarecrow, until one day the reality changed around him, and he started to walk and move by himself. Now join Sandalation in his adventure, as he uses his sandals and explore his new world.

Team: 
Andress Martin
Henrique Martins
Kelvin Santos
Victor Belarmino

Controls: 
WASD to move
SPACE to jump
E to interact or use item
Mouse buttons to attack and throw rocks
